message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its worth to be $12000 to me. However, considering your specific needs and the benefits it could bring to you, I am willing to offer it to you at an exceptional price of $9500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing this further with you.
